Reviews.Title: memory is terrible
Reviews.Author: geraldchubbuck
Reviews.Content: the camera is good for the money but just barely.the pros:price> I picked it up for $10.00 what can you get for that. this camerasize>its tiny easily fitting in a pocket or purse (my sis harrowed it.)the cons:no view screen.long delay before taking pictures.the memory is wiped if battery die.non standard usb cable.if you desire to buy this do your self the favor and get a sd card so you don't loose your pics.I'm giving this to my niece and getting a new camera for myself. that's about the level of it.

Reviews.Title: ok for a starter camera
Reviews.Author: Lois T. "Lois"
Reviews.Content: it is ok for a starter camera. pics are ok. there is no preview screen to preview your pics when they are taken. u have to upload them onto the computer to view them.  overall it is ok. and i will keep it for a 2nd camera.
